alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 4:07PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Edinburg. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 21.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 18.0 Sun 2 pm CDT 19.9 20.6 21.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1000 PM CDT.
